function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent definitions and allocation of NPIs like work from home leading to identifiability problems","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing compliance and quantifying the impact of NPIs","Mitigation":"Standardizing definitions, conducting regular surveys, and setting clear legal requirements for NPIs","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring and analyzing NPI compliance","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, and employers","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers, and employers"},{"Description":"Lack of match between hospital data and NPIs at the regional level","Impact":"Inability to accurately estimate transmission rates and assess the effectiveness of NPIs","Mitigation":"Integration of hospital data and NPI implementation data at regional level, statistical modeling","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data integration and analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists, public health authorities","Owner":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Variability in the impact of partial bar closure across regions","Impact":"Inconsistency in estimating the impact of NPIs on disease transmission","Mitigation":"Consideration of regional demographics, population size, and city distribution in NPI impact assessment","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, demographic data platforms","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers"}]}
